ğŸ¶ Sensitive Stomach & Hypoallergenic Options

Purina Pro Plan Veterinary Diets Gentle Snackers Hydrolyzed â€“ Premium hypoallergenic treat made with hydrolyzed proteins that are easier to digest and less likely to trigger sensitivities; ideal if your dog has known food intolerance issues.
â€£ Good choice when paired with a vet-recommended sensitive diet.

Soft Snack India 100g â€“ Gentle soft snacks that can be easier on a sensitive tummy than hard, high-fat biscuits; soft texture often helps dogs with digestion issues.

ğŸ¾ Gentle Everyday Treats (Training / Regular Use)

High Value Training Treats â€“ Smaller, softer treats that are easier to portion and digest during training sessions; pick versions with limited ingredients and without artificial additives.

ğŸ§  Tips for Choosing Dog Biscuits/Treats for Sensitive Stomachs

âœ” Grain-free or limited ingredient â€” Helps avoid common allergens (wheat, corn, soy) that can upset digestion. 
Smiling Pets

âœ” Avoid artificial preservatives & colours â€” Easier on the gut and less irritating. 
Smiling Pets

âœ” Look for products with digestive support ingredients like pumpkin, ginger, or probiotics. 
Health Extension

âœ” Introduce new treats slowly in small amounts and observe how your dog responds.

ğŸ• General Advice (India)

Since many standard Indian dog biscuits (e.g., Pedigree, Purepet) are not specifically formulated for sensitive stomachs unless labelled so, you may want to prioritise hypoallergenic, grain-free, or specialized digestive support treats. 
Supertails

If your dog has significant digestive sensitivities, consider consulting your vet for tailored recommendations and possibly a vet-prescribed digestive treat or diet.
